25934.name: Page Generator
25934.description:
Pages Generator


When you're kicking off a new project in Figma you probably like to create a specific page order in your file and keep that order consistent from project to project. However, you don't have to create every single one of those pages one by one, every single time, This plugin helps you to generate pages in Figma, that you make every time before starting any project.


Once you run this Plugin you will see these pages generated:


üëãIntro

üíéStyle Guide

‚öôÔ∏è Figma Assets


Thank you

Himanshu Raikwar

26026.name: Copy Colors
26026.description:
Figma can swap fills and strokes. But what if you need both of them?


  1. Select some layers
  2. Choose destination (copy to stroke or to fill)
  3. Hit Enter


The plugin copies the content of fill and pastes it into stroke (and vice versa). Colors and styles are easy to copy manually. But the plugin will be useful if you have complex fill like gradients and images.


Made w/<3 by qurle

25264.name: locize
25264.description:
What is locize?

Ôªø

locize is a new online service that offers true continuous localization. The translations are managed in your locize project and published from there to the locize CDN to be consumed from your application. The localization team can take care of the translations from the first day and keep up with changes with ease. The processes are separated. Translations can be updated without the need to release an update of your app. locize is bridging the gap between translation and development!


Best for


All involved in the software localization process: Developers, Designers, Team Leads, Heads of Engineering, Translation/Localization team, Product Managers, Project Leaders, Marketing, etc...

 

For more information please visit: https://locize.com

 

Why connect locize and Figma?

 

Bridging the gap between translation and design with locize, a modern and affordable localization-management-platform. It makes your website, app, game or whatever your project is, global, vibrant, and more engaging especially when unleashing the continuous localization capabilities.


Pushing texts from Figma to locize. Send first text content from within Figma to locize in seconds so that your Translators can start their work right away.

 

Try your designs in a different language by fetching other translations directly into Figma. Preview your designs in all your languages before handoff to Developers.

 

Increase your overall translation quality and reduce feedback loops.


How to set up

For more information and to learn how to install the plugin visit https://docs.locize.com/more/figma-plugin

Don‚Äôt have a locize account? Try it for free! https://www.locize.app/register

26170.name: Sur les r√©seaux ‚Äî social networks art generator
26170.description:
User Studio's super efficient generator of social images to showcase articles, case studies‚Ä¶ Instantly generates ready-to-use and perfectly-sized pics for:

  • Linkedin
  • Twitter
  • Instagram publications
  • Instagram stories

Requires an image URL, a main quote and an article URL. And that's all you need!

manifest.name: Sur les r√©seaux ‚Äî social networks art generator by User Studio

26299.name: (easy)Grid
26299.description:
(Easy)grid lets you place pixel perfect grids onto any layer in seconds, grids that can be made without having to manually work out the sizing or positioning, and that can be rapidly modified until perfect.


How many times have you had to create a grid or layout, and found yourself spending too much time finding the correct sizes for each section, messing around with spacing to ensure it looks perfect, or having to perfectly align it? well now that's going to be quicker then ever.



FEATURES


üé® Create layout patterns ranging from a couple of rows or columns to creating the layout for whole tools and software


üë®‚Äçüíª Reduce mistakes and time needed by not needing to worry about sizing or positioning your layout


üì≤ Move the layout from the plugin directly over your selected Figma layout


‚è≥ Your layout options are remembered after you move them into Figma, and after you change your selection, letting you test a layout over different sized screens, or quickly prototyping variations



CAN BE USED FOR 


  • simple repetitive layouts
  • website and app layout
  • guides for digital graphics
  • testing out variations of a layout
  • quickly populate wireframe elements



TO USE


  1. Select a layer to create the grid over, can be a rectangle or a frame.
  2. Enter the amount of cells you want in the Grid column / Grid row fields. You can also enter the size of each cell by writing it manually (separated by spaces) either by using exact values (in points) or by using a total fraction of the grid.
  3. Adjust the Column gap / Row gap to your liking
  4. If you want to merge cells to create a more complicated pattern, using the preview menu, drag and drop on the cells you want to create them as a single shape. 
  5. Press the ‚ÄúApply To Selected‚Äù button to insert the grid into Figma.
  6. Undo (CTRL / CMD + Z) and change values if not happy with the results.



MORE INFORMATION


Visit our website at https://easygrid-app.web.app/. We also respond to all questions and feedback posted in the comments area.
26299.release_notes:
- Fixed the content in the help section
- Updated icon & cover art
- Fixed icon next to "Clear merges" button

25764.name: Rename Page
25764.description:
A super minimal plugin for keyboard persons. rename current page with keyboard from quick actions.

  1. Open quick actions
  2. Type rename page
  3. Enter new name
  4. Press enter


you can put $& in the new name if you want to use current name as part of new name

parameters.name: New name
parameters.description: Enter new name (use $& for current name)

25760.name: Design file template
25760.description:
A basic design file template to organise your design files and make it easier for everyone to understand and follow your workflow.


Just run the plugin to get started!

25912.name: Layers names cleaner
25912.description:
Rename layers without increment numbers.


Code from yuanqing

26296.name: Pixel Princess
26296.description:
Pixel Princess allows you to turn vector lines into pixel art. üíï


Currently only lines are supported, fills aren't. Working on it!


Select the vector line, open the plugin, enter pixel size, press ‚ÄúPixelate Selection‚Äù. While the plugin is open, any updates to the vector would be reflected in its pixel representation in real time.

26293.name: Renamed
26293.description:
Easily rename and transform the layer name case.


Works with current page or selected layers.

26241.name: Accidently Great Font Pairings
26241.description:
Ever found yourself trying to come up with an interesting font pairing? Test your luck and see if it can happen by accident!


The plugin uses hand picked Google Fonts and pairs them randomly. Have fun!

26159.name: weave.ly
26159.description:
Your design, with real data, running on real devices, validated by real users.


Prototyping on Steroids


If clickable prototypes still don't cut it and you need real functional prototypes, who you gonna call?


weave.ly enables you to get more out of your designs. That means:


  • More fidelity: Gradually add functionality and real data to those parts of your design that most require it!
  • More testing: Our platform turns your designs automatically into fully functional web apps. Just share the link with users and let them test it in the field!
  • More data: our apps automatically track usability statistics, provided in a handy dashboard for you to draw insights from!


For more complete information and tutorials go to https://weave.ly.


BETA


This plugin is currently released as a beta prototype of the final product. What this means for you is:

  • Functionality and support for various Figma design elements is currently limited, but expanded on a regular basis.
  • You will most definitely encounter bugs!
  • Any and all feedback is more than appreciated, just send us a mail at info@weave.ly.

26298.name: Project Setup
26298.description:
Project Setup


A Figma plugin that creates the pages and the needed frames for your new projects.


Inside some of the Pages frames get generated with their respected dimensions. So you can get straight into designing your next project.


Pages that get generated:

  • Cover Page
  • StyleBoard
  • MoodBoard
  • Logo Design
  • Brand Elements
  • Brand Guidelines
  • Web Design
  • Behance Project
  • Behance Thumbnail
  • Dribbble Shot
  • Instagram Post

26229.name: Sigma
26229.description: Sigma is a Figma plugin of automatically generate SwiftUI code from Figma

26204.name: ToC+
26204.description:
A plugin to help designers and viewers organize and navigate Figma files.


Features


Generate pages by sections in one-click

  • Customizable section names.
  • Parse existing file page sections, and saves previously used sections.
  • Allow hiding certain sections/pages/artboards from the ToC by starting the name with `_`.

Generate table-of-contents

  • Organized by section > page > artboard.
  • Each page/artboard is clickable, links directly to that item.
  • Re-run anytime to fresh.

Placeholder cover page

  • "Last updated" auto updates whenever the plugin runs.

26281.name: Make Hover State
26281.description:
Take any component or variant set and quickly scaffold hover states for them with interactive components.


Get Started

  1. Select one or more components and/or variant sets
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Style your new hover state variants!


This will generate a clone of the existing component (or each variant in a component set), create a variant property group called Hovered with True and False values, and connect the new variant up to the original with a hover interaction trigger.


Limitations

There is currently a limitation with variant sets, where the plugin doesn't work if there is already a property group with the word "hover" in it. This is built in so that in future the plugin can support intelligently completing half-built variant sets, but it seems like it would be very prone to edge cases so I'm not sure if I'll ever support it. For now, use the plugin on either sole components or variant sets without hover states defined.

26239.name: adam
26239.description:
The plugin transforms Figma frames/elements to jsx code.


You have 3 options:

  1. copy json which created from Figma
  2. download result code with jsx for your React project
  3. look preview your result


This plugin created for ATI.SU, but you can use it
